programme.desc: A bisexual woman (Desiree Akhavan, who also directed) from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed while staging silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement announcement

programme.title: Flash of Genius
programme.desc: Detroit college professor Robert Kearns presents Ford with an ingenious idea for the windscreen wiper. When the automotive giants steal his invention, Kearns embarks upon a long and arduous legal battle that takes a terrible toll on his personal life. Drama

programme.title: Meet the Donors: Does Money Talk?
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi looks at money in politics and interviews wealthy donors to Republican and Democratic parties to ask them about their contributions and philosophies. Also: a look at efforts to enact campaign-finance reform

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: All-star heist sequel. The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot. Director: Steven Soderbergh (Conclusion of tonight's film)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, an intelligent but self-conscious deskbound CIA analyst (Melissa McCarthy) is finally given the chance to go undercover as a homely "cat lady" in order to save her missing partner (Jude Law) and thwart a global disaster at the hands of a dangerous arms dealer. Written and directed by Paul Feig

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: When a royal Soul Reaper treasure is stolen, Toshiro Hitsugaya, boy-wonder captain of Squad 10, disappears too

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This touching biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him

programme.title: Hollywoodland
programme.desc: Stylish 50s-set drama about a private eye investigating one of the entertainment industry's most enduring mysteries, the apparent suicide of Superman star George Reeves. However, his enquiries lead him deep into Hollywood's seedy underbelly, uncovering a love triangle involving a former showgirl and a powerful studio executive

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Synthetic drugs give a woman superhuman powers, which she uses to strike back against her captors in this explosive thriller from the legendary Luc Besson. In time, her increased intelligence causes her to become disconnected from the rest of humanity

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Newlywed Ted wants to become a father, but must prove he's a person in a court of law first

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her

programme.title: Sarah Silverman: We Are Miracles
programme.desc: Emmy-winning comedienne Sarah Silverman performs her adults-only stand-up in front of an intimate audience of just 39 fans in Los Angeles(n)

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: John Form gives the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia with a beautiful and rare vintage doll in a pure white wedding dress. However their home is invaded by members of a satanic cult, who violently attack the couple on one horrific night(n)

programme.title: Baby Boy
programme.desc: (2001) John Singleton's film is set in South Central Los Angeles, where it's another day in paradise for Jody (Tyrese Gibson), a hopeless, jobless youngster whose current partner, Yvette (Taraji P. Henson) has just had an abortion. Unable to care for the child he has by another woman, Jody is forced to live with his mother Juanita (A. J. Johnson), who has another preoccupation: her growing relationship with ex-gangster Melvin (VIng Rhames). To make some cash, Jody enlists the help of his friend Sweetpea (Omar Gooding) to boost some clothes and sell them on. It's a bad decision, compounded by his actions toward Yvette and the arrival of her sinister ex-boyfriend, Rodney (Snoop Dogg) on the scene... Premiere(n)

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: In this lively comedy, an African American yuppie rethinks life on the corporate fast-track after he falls in love with an ultra hip club promoter. Knowing that she finds him a total square, he seeks the advice of a swinging young mail boy(n)

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: A grieving couple is offered the chance to bring their late son back to life in this stylish thriller. Paul Duncan (Greg Kinnear) and his wife, Jessie (Rebecca Romijn-Stamos), are the proud parents of a bright, happy, and healthy eight-year-old son, Adam (Cameron Bright). Paul and Jessie are highly devoted to Adam, and are devastated when he's killed in a freak auto accident. The Duncans are still stricken with grief when they're approached by Dr. Richard Wells (Robert De Niro), who makes a startling proposal -- Wells operates an experimental fertility clinic, and he's developed a technique by which an embryo could be created from cloned cells taken from their late son, which would be implanted in Jessie's womb. Nine months later, Jessie would give birth to a child exactly like Adam in every way. While Paul and Jessie are initially shocked by this suggestion, in time they decide to give Adam the chance to grow to adulthood and they take up Wells on his offer. The cloned Adam is born healthy and content, and all seems to be well until the child begins to approach his eighth birthday, when events take a startling turn(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Jerry Zucker's fantasy story stars Patrick Swayze as Sam Wheat and Demi Moore as Molly Jensen. He's killed in an apparent random mugging, leaving her heartbroken. But when it transpires he was murdered to stop him exposing a major fraud, Molly's in danger because the incriminating information is in her possession. Sam's ghost, still earthbound, finds out that the only way to warn her is through Oda Mae Brown, a fake medium who suddenly finds she's his channel to the living. A mix of comedy, thriller and romance (throwing a pot will never be the same again) coupled with outstanding special effects have turned this into an enduring, enjoyable classic(n)

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Jack Nicholson and Morgan Freeman star in this touching, no-holds-barred adventure directed by Rob Reiner that shows it's never too late to live life to its fullest. One man was smart enough to go to college, but has worked his entire life as a mechanic the other owns the hospital in which they are both patients. But these two men with little time left and even less to lose discover that life can be deeply moving and definitely hilarious(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Journalism; and the Opening Ceremony of the 2016 Olympics in Rio are discussed(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: World of Hurt. A search for Andre's weakness becomes a full-time job for Spencer and Joe; Vernon's anxiety gets the best of him; Jason's pursuit of a client is no easy task; Ricky tries to figure out where his dad is coming from(n)

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: The Season of the Witch. Detective Box pieces together Naz's whereabouts on the night of the murder. Meanwhile, Naz gets revenge for a recent attack; and Stone presses Trevor for details on the night of Andrea's murder(n)

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue captain accepts a potentially lucrative offer to seek out a sunken treasure in the Black Sea despite the sneaking suspicion that he may be double crossed(n)

programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD(n)

James Gordon (voice of Bryan Cranston), an honest cop dealing with a corrupt police force. Adapted from the comic-book series by Frank Miller and David Mazzucchelli

programme.title: This Boy's Life
programme.desc: This Boy's Life is a true-life coming-of-age story about '50s teenager Tobias Wolff (Leonardo DiCaprio) and his mother, Caroline (Ellen Barkin). After travelling around the country in an effort to avoid Caroline's abusive boyfriend, the mother and son settle in Washington state, where she marries a man named Dwight Hansen (Robert DeNiro), who appears to be a good husband and father. However, Dwight reveals himself as an abusive man shortly after the marriage; in particular, he verbally harasses and physically beats the young Tobias. By the end of the film, Tobias has to confront his stepfather. This Boy's Life is based on the autobiographical book of the same name by the real Tobias Wolff(r)

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: Gifted architect Sabine de Barra is hired to design a section of the elaborate landscaping at the Palace of Versailles for Louis XIV. The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she also must contend with renowned landscaper André Le Notre, with whom she develops both a professional and romantic relationship(r)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Follow-up to the hit comedy Bruce Almighty. God appears before a sceptical congressman to tell him that his destiny is to be the modern-day Noah and build an ark capable of withstanding a mighty flood. While the congressman initially struggles to come to terms with his task and begins to question his own sanity, he soon finds himself gathering animals, chopping wood and trying to convince his disbelieving family(r)

programme.title: Tender Mercies
programme.desc: Tender Mercies is a compassionate love story tracing the relationship between a down and out singer and the young widow he meets in a small Texas town. Robert Duvall stars as MacSledge a man torn between the healing powers ofl ove and the conflicts of his past life as an alcoholic music star. Mac's love for his new wife Rosa Lee is tested by the temptations of renewed fame and the intervention of his bitter ex-wife, Dixie

programme.title: The Judge
programme.desc: A lawyer discovers his estranged father is the prime suspect in his mother's death when he returns to his hometown for her funeral

programme.title: Mulholland Dr.
programme.desc: David Lynch's Cannes-winning film stars Laura Elena Harring as the victim of a car crash who stumbles into Naomi Watts' apartment, her memory wiped. Watts, in Los Angeles to become an actress, befriends her but, as they try to discover Harring's true identity, neither of them are quite what they seem as Lynch subtly changes their lives and roles in this unique thriller
